1.1.0.en: Added more data from the TWC.

1.2.1.en: Better icon for charger and added settings for poll interval.

1.2.3.en: Added better images for the app and descriptions.

1.2.4.en: When car a is not connected, consumption is set to 0.

1.3.0.en: Added lifetime, wifi status and version information to the settings panel on the device.

1.3.1.en: Added lifetime, wifi status and version information to the settings panel on the device. Change the device name to TWC Gen3 and update the description.

1.3.2.en: Change the power calculations in respect to single phase and three phases( line-to-line and line-to-neutral).

1.4.0.en: Changed the capabilities to work with the status indicators.

1.4.1.en: Changed capabilities to function with the status indicator. Please remove and add the device again to make the new capabilities and indicators work.

1.4.2.en: Decoded SSID. For 1.4.x please remove and add the device again to get the new capabilities and indicators to work correctly.

1.4.3.en: Added more data from the TWC.

1.4.4.en: Fixed minor bugs, move to github

1.4.5.en: Rename the app, change to royalty free images and text to be complient with GPLv3. Moved to GitHub.

1.4.8.en: Added bug fix for voltage in firmware 22.41.2+gdb42f98c0aafdd

1.4.9.en: Added a fixed value adjustment in the settings for the voltage reported from the TWC.
